title: Don't forget to VOTE!
body:
Not that any of you - being the super savvy, ultra-intelligent, in-the-know readership that you are - would forget such a thing. However, I've known people who have forgotten before... so consider this a gentle reminder. Also, if you come into The Moxie tonight with your "I Voted" sticker, OR your voter registration card, we'll give you the discounted matinee price.

Don't forget to do your part, and remember to vote "NO" on the Springfield bar ban (hint: it's the last question on the ballot). Good luck!
author: Dan

comments.author: Master RJ
comments.body:
Posted By: dan
Posted By: TheFosheso people under 21 one cant come to moxie now?
The Moxie is an all-ages venue, and will continue to be one. We are not effected by the bar ban, as our revenue isn't 60% or more from alcohol sales. I better make a blog post about this, in case that's the rumor going around.
If it were 21 and up, Dan would have never shown Duma.
